Class ActiveTorrent

  • java.lang.Object
    • btClient.ActiveTorrent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ActiveTorrent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CommunicationTracker communicationTracker
      The CommunicationTracker that links this ActiveTorrent to the BitTorrent Tracker
      private java.io.File file
      The location to where downloaded bytes are written
      private int gui_index
      The row number that corresponds to this torrent in the GUI table
      private java.util.ArrayList<MessageHandler> message_handlers
      All the MessageHandler objects related to this torrent
      private java.util.ArrayList<Peer> peers
      The list of Peer objects that this ActiveTorrent is connected to
      private java.util.ArrayList<Piece> pieces
      The Piece objects that comprise the download for this ActiveTorrent
      private BtUtils.Status status
      A string describing the status of this torrent
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Thread> threads
      The list of threads associated with this ActiveTorrent
      private java.util.Timer timer 
      private TorrentInfo torrentInfo
      The TorrentInfo file that is associated with this ActiveTorrent
      private int unchoked_peer_count
      Number of peers connected to the client and related to this torrent that are unchoked

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Checks the completeness of the file by calling Piece.isComplete() for each Piece
        Parameters:
        pieces - ArrayList of pieces that make up the file
        Returns:
        True if all pieces are complete, otherwise false

      • start

        public void start()
           throws BtException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Initializes and runs this ActiveTorrent object. Sends "started" message to the tracker. Gets the peer list from the CommuncationTracker. Creates and runs a new MessageHandler thread for each Peer. Creates a new Timer. Creates and schedules timer tasks for the ActiveTorrent: ChokeHandler timer task KeepAlive timer task. Creates and runs a PeerConnectionListener thread.
        Throws:
        BtException
        java.io.IOException

      • run

        public void run()
        Calls start() then continuously updates this ActiveTorrent's status until it is stopped. Cancels all future scheduled tasks when stopped.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws BtException,
                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        Stops the ActiveTorrent by calling MessageHandler.kill() for each MessageHandler associated with this torrent. Also disconnects all associated Peer objects by calling Peer.disconnect() and joins all MessageHandler threads then sends a stopped message to the tracker and updates that ActiveTorrent's status.
        Throws:
        BtException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • createPieces

        private void createPieces()
                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Creates a new piece object for the total number of pieces in the file to be downloaded and adds them to the pieces array list
        Parameters:
        pieces - ArrayList of piece objects
        torrentInfo - TorrentInfo object for the active download
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
